mapper.insert: insert into broker_message_log (message_id, message, status, next_retry, create_time, update_time) values (#{messageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{message,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextRetry,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
